value.title: Meet the new European unicorns of 2026
value.content: From Belgium to Ukraine, five fresh European unicorns were minted this January.

value.title: HomeBoost’s app will show you where to save on your utility bills
value.content: The startup is partnering with utilities to help homeowners determine the best upgrades to cut their energy use.

value.title: a16z partner Kofi Ampadu to leave firm after TxO program pause
value.content: Ampadu's departure perhaps signals the end of the TxO chapter. The fund and program focused on supporting underserved founders by providing access to tech networks and investment capital through a donor-advised fund.

value.title: Uber is literally in the driver’s seat when it comes to AV bets
value.content: Self-driving truck startup Waabi’s billion-dollar fundraise isn’t just about trucks.   The deal, for $750 million up front plus another $250 million from Uber tied to deployment milestones, marks a major expansion into robotaxis for the company founded by former Uber AI chief Raquel Urtasun. It also feels like another chip from Uber on the autonomous vehicle roulette table. With more […]

value.title: Uber puts another chip on the self-driving roulette table
value.content: Self-driving truck startup Waabi’s billion-dollar fundraise isn’t just about trucks.   The deal, for $750 million up front plus another $250 million from Uber tied to deployment milestones, marks a major expansion into robotaxis for the company founded by former Uber AI chief Raquel Urtasun. It also feels like another chip from Uber on the autonomous vehicle roulette table. With more […]

value.title: Last 24 hours to grab your plus-one pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
value.content: Today is the last day to lock in a plus-one pass at 50% off to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026, happening on October 13-15 in San Francisco.

value.title: Apple buys Israeli startup Q.ai as the AI race heats up
value.content: Q.ai is an Israeli startup specializing in imaging and machine learning, particularly technologies that enable devices to interpret whispered speech and enhance audio in noisy environments.

value.title: Upwind raises $250M at $1.5B valuation to continue building ‘runtime’ cloud security
value.content: The $250 million Series B was led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with participation from Salesforce Ventures and Picture Capital.

value.title: SpaceX is coming to the public markets, and secondaries are already on fire
value.content: paceX is reportedly lining up four major Wall Street banks for a 2026 IPO that could provide the reset the market needs.  The company just completed a tender offer at an $800 billion valuation, and secondary market demand is through the roof. If SpaceX goes public anywhere near its rumored $1.5 trillion valuation, it could trigger an IPO cascade for other late-stage unicorns like OpenAI, Stripe, and Databricks.  Watch as Equity host Rebecca Bellan […]

value.title: AI security startup Outtake raises $40M from Iconiq, Satya Nadella, Bill Ackman, and other big names
value.content: Outtake makes an agentic cybersecurity platform to help enterprises detect identity fraud. Its angel investors read like a who's who of tech industry names.

value.title: The SpaceX IPO could finally happen (and it’s a big deal)
value.content: SpaceX is reportedly lining up four major Wall Street banks for a 2026 IPO that could provide the reset the market needs.  The company just completed a tender offer at an $800 billion valuation, and secondary market demand is through the roof. If SpaceX goes public anywhere near its rumored $1.5 trillion valuation, it could trigger an IPO cascade for other late-stage unicorns like OpenAI, Stripe, and Databricks.  Today on TechCrunch’s Equity podcast, Rebecca […]

value.title: Jennifer Garner’s Once Upon a Farm resumes IPO plans
value.content: The organic kids' snack food company may debut as soon as next week. It has issued a price range for shares, an SEC filing shows.

value.title: AI data labeler Handshake buys  Cleanlab, an acquisition target of multiple others
value.content: The deal’s purpose is primarily to acquire talent, aka an acqui-hire, adding nine key Cleanlab employees to Handshake’s research organization.

value.title: Tiny startup Arcee AI built a 400B-parameter open source LLM from scratch to best Meta’s Llama
value.content: 30-person startup Arcee AI has released a 400B model called Trinity, which it says is one of the biggest open source foundation models from a U.S. company.

value.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026: Plus-one passes are almost gone and only 3 days remain
value.content: The TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 plus-one passes at 50% off are almost sold out, and this deal ends in 3 days. Register here before this deal ends on Friday, January 30 at 11:59 p.m. PT.

value.title: The conference where founders scale: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 tickets are now live at the lowest prices
value.content: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 unites 1,100 founders and investors in Boston on June 23 for a day focused on real-world scaling insights and networking that pushes the needle. Save up to $300 on your ticket.

value.title: Redwood attracts Google for its $425M Series E as AI power needs rise
value.content: Google is the latest investor to back Redwood Materials as the battery recycling startup scales a new energy storage venture to power AI data centers and other industrial sites.

value.title: Fashion rental app By Rotation and Uber partner to help deliver ski clothing
value.content: By Rotation, one of the U.K.’s most popular peer-to-peer fashion rental platforms, is partnering with Uber to deliver ski clothes.

value.title: Anduril has invented a wild new drone-flying contest where jobs are the prize
value.content: This is a race series for software programmers and the brainchild of founder Palmer Luckey, he tells TechCrunch.

value.title: Anthropic reportedly upped its latest raise to $20B
value.content: Anthropic looks to raise $20 billion at more than $300 billion valuation, according to reports.
